ygData.subject: Chants
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, over the weekend, I finally hit 38 *AND* finished my Nostrolo Tamborine quest :o)  Groouping with a 45 druid guildbro at the FV giants, I switched
ygData.messageBody:
Well, over the weekend, I finally hit 38 *AND* finished my Nostrolo Tamborine quest :o) Groouping with a 45 druid guildbro at the FV giants, I switched tactics from the old "play mansong while he roots and DoTs til the giant is almost dead, then get in and melee it down (since he is usally lom anyway)", to the new and imrpoved "manasong and chants with drum equipped". Heh! The druid was amazed that over the long run, when the giant broke root, it would come straight for me instead of him.

-=B=-
38th and Climbing
Mini-Nuker
The Rathe


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
